name: Zyklon O[ffice]
description:
Your paper production office is under attack from apocalypse bringing aliens! They have besieged the building, and are throwing gas bombs at the roof. The deadly gas is spreading, and threatening to kill all your workers! Move your officers to safer places, and close doors to block the gas. Just remember that the building's main power generator has failed, and there is only enough power to keep 7 doors closed at a time.

Controls:

The controls are fully mouse based, click and drag office workers to move them, and click doors to open or close them

Credits:

Everything was made in approximately 3 hours, apart from the main menu, which according to the Trijam rules, is NOT part of the actual game development time. 

Made for the Trijam 208 game jam.

Made using the Godot Engine (© Juan Linietsky & Godot Contributors), and Aseprite (© Igara Studios)
